channel.title: Posts on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My New Hugo Site

item.title: toku
item.description:
ged@DESKTOP-K1VCLO9 MINGW64 ~
$ cd work

ged@DESKTOP-K1VCLO9 MINGW64 ~/work
$ hugo new site blog

ged@DESKTOP-K1VCLO9 MINGW64 ~/work
$ cd blog

ged@DESKTOP-K1VCLO9 MINGW64 ~/work/blog
$ mkdir themes

ged@DESKTOP-K1VCLO9 MINGW64 ~/work/blog
$ ls
archetypes/  config.toml  content/  data/  layouts/  static/  themes/

ged@DESKTOP-K1VCLO9 MINGW64 ~/work/blog
$ hugo new post/hoge.med
C:\Users\ged\work\blog\content\post\hoge.med created

ged@DESKTOP-K1VCLO9 MINGW64 ~/work/blog
$ hugo new post/hoge.med
ERROR: 2016/03/11 C:\Users\ged\work\blog\content\post\hoge.med already exists

ged@DESKTOP-K1VCLO9 MINGW64 ~/work/blog
$

ged@DESKTOP-K1VCLO9 MINGW64 ~/work/blog
$ hugo new post/hoge.md
C:\Users\ged\work\blog\content\post\hoge.md created

ged@DESKTOP-K1VCLO9 MINGW64 ~/work/blog
$ hugo server -t angels-ladder -D
FATAL: 2016/03/11 Unable to find theme Directory: C:\Users\ged\work\blog\themes\angels-ladder

ged@DESKTOP-K1VCLO9 MINGW64 ~/work/blog
$ cd themes/

ged@DESKTOP-K1VCLO9 MINGW64 ~/work/blog/themes
$ ls

ged@DESKTOP-K1VCLO9 MINGW64 ~/work/blog/themes
$ git clone https://github.com/tanksuzuki/angels-ladder
Cloning into 'angels-ladder'...
remote: Counting objects: 254, done.
remote: TReceioving objectstal 2:  53% (135/54 (de254), lta 0), re464.used 0 (delta 0),0 pack-reused 254
Receiving objects: 100% (254/254), 479.49 KiB | 134.00 KiB/s, done.
Resolving deltas: 100% (142/142), done.
Checking connectivity... done.

ged@DESKTOP-K1VCLO9 MINGW64 ~/work/blog/themes
$ cd ..

ged@DESKTOP-K1VCLO9 MINGW64 ~/work/blog
$ hugo server -t angels-ladder -D
1 of 1 draft rendered
0 future content
1 pages created
1 paginator pages created
0 tags created
0 categories created
in 7 ms
Watching for changes in C:\Users\ged\work\blog/{data,content,layouts,static,themes}
Serving pages from memory
Web Server is available at http://localhost:1313/blog/ (bind address 127.0.0.1)
Press Ctrl+C to stop


ged@DESKTOP-K1VCLO9 MINGW64 ~/work/blog
$ hugo -t angels-ladder -D
1 of 1 draft rendered
0 future content
1 pages created
1 paginator pages created
0 tags created
0 categories created
in 42 ms

ged@DESKTOP-K1VCLO9 MINGW64 ~/work/blog
$ ls
archetypes/  config.toml  content/  data/  layouts/  public/  static/  themes/

ged@DESKTOP-K1VCLO9 MINGW64 ~/work/blog
$ cd public/

ged@DESKTOP-K1VCLO9 MINGW64 ~/work/blog/public
$ git init
Initialized empty Git repository in C:/Users/ged/Work/blog/public/.git/

ged@DESKTOP-K1VCLO9 MINGW64 ~/work/blog/public (master)
$ git remote add origin https://github.com/ged1959/blog.git

ged@DESKTOP-K1VCLO9 MINGW64 ~/work/blog/public (master)
$ git checkout -b gh-pages
Switched to a new branch 'gh-pages'

ged@DESKTOP-K1VCLO9 MINGW64 ~/work/blog/public (gh-pages)
$ ls
404.html  css/  images/  index.html  index.xml  js/  page/  post/  sitemap.xml

ged@DESKTOP-K1VCLO9 MINGW64 ~/work/blog/public (gh-pages)
$ git add .

ged@DESKTOP-K1VCLO9 MINGW64 ~/work/blog/public (gh-pages)
$ git commit -m "1st"
[gh-pages (root-commit) f0474d6] 1st
 16 files changed, 1197 insertions(+)
 create mode 100644 404.html
 create mode 100644 css/custom.css
 create mode 100644 css/highlight_monokai.css
 create mode 100644 css/responsive.css
 create mode 100644 css/sanitize.css
 create mode 100644 css/theme.css
 create mode 100644 css/theme.less
 create mode 100644 images/profile.png
 create mode 100644 index.html
 create mode 100644 index.xml
 create mode 100644 js/highlight.pack.js
 create mode 100644 page/1/index.html
 create mode 100644 post/hoge/index.html
 create mode 100644 post/index.html
 create mode 100644 post/index.xml
 create mode 100644 sitemap.xml

ged@DESKTOP-K1VCLO9 MINGW64 ~/work/blog/public (gh-pages)
$ git push -u origin gh-pages
Counting objects: 24, done.
Delta compression using up to 4 threads.
Compressing objects: 100% (18/18), done.
Writing objects: 100% (24/24), 34.52 KiB | 0 bytes/s, done.
Total 24 (delta 4), reused 0 (delta 0)
To https://github.com/ged1959/blog.git
 * [new branch]      gh-pages -> gh-pages
Branch gh-pages set up to track remote branch gh-pages from origin.

ged@DESKTOP-K1VCLO9 MINGW64 ~/work/blog/public (gh-pages)
$ cd ..

ged@DESKTOP-K1VCLO9 MINGW64 ~/work/blog
$ ls
archetypes/  config.toml  content/  data/  layouts/  public/  static/  themes/

ged@DESKTOP-K1VCLO9 MINGW64 ~/work/blog
$ hugo new post/gege.md
C:\Users\ged\work\blog\content\post\gege.md created

ged@DESKTOP-K1VCLO9 MINGW64 ~/work/blog
$ hugo -t angels-ladder -D
2 of 2 drafts rendered
0 future content
2 pages created
1 paginator pages created
0 tags created
0 categories created
in 44 ms

ged@DESKTOP-K1VCLO9 MINGW64 ~/work/blog
$ cd public/

ged@DESKTOP-K1VCLO9 MINGW64 ~/work/blog/public (gh-pages)
$ git status
On branch gh-pages
Your branch is up-to-date with 'origin/gh-pages'.
Changes not staged for commit:
  (use "git add <file>..." to update what will be committed)
  (use "git checkout -- <file>..." to discard changes in working directory)

        modified:   index.html
        modified:   index.xml
        modified:   post/hoge/index.html
        modified:   post/index.html
        modified:   post/index.xml
        modified:   sitemap.xml

Untracked files:
  (use "git add <file>..." to include in what will be committed)

        post/gege/

no changes added to commit (use "git add" and/or "git commit -a")

ged@DESKTOP-K1VCLO9 MINGW64 ~/work/blog/public (gh-pages)
$ git add .

ged@DESKTOP-K1VCLO9 MINGW64 ~/work/blog/public (gh-pages)
$ git commit -m "2nd"
[gh-pages 67e91d0] 2nd
 7 files changed, 181 insertions(+), 3 deletions(-)
 create mode 100644 post/gege/index.html

ged@DESKTOP-K1VCLO9 MINGW64 ~/work/blog/public (gh-pages)
$ git push -u origin gh-pages
Counting objects: 12, done.
Delta compression using up to 4 threads.
Compressing objects: 100% (10/10), done.
Writing objects: 100% (12/12), 1.34 KiB | 0 bytes/s, done.
Total 12 (delta 8), reused 0 (delta 0)
To https://github.com/ged1959/blog.git
   f0474d6..67e91d0  gh-pages -> gh-pages
Branch gh-pages set up to track remote branch gh-pages from origin.

ged@DESKTOP-K1VCLO9 MINGW64 ~/work/blog/public (gh-pages)
$ cd ,,
bash: cd: ,,: No such file or directory

ged@DESKTOP-K1VCLO9 MINGW64 ~/work/blog/public (gh-pages)
$ cd ..

ged@DESKTOP-K1VCLO9 MINGW64 ~/work/blog
$ hugo server -t angels-ladder -D
2 of 2 drafts rendered
0 future content
2 pages created
1 paginator pages created
0 tags created
0 categories created
in 9 ms
Watching for changes in C:\Users\ged\work\blog/{data,content,layouts,static,themes}
Serving pages from memory
Web Server is available at http://localhost:1313/blog/ (bind address 127.0.0.1)
Press Ctrl+C to stop


ged@DESKTOP-K1VCLO9 MINGW64 ~/work/blog
$ hugo -t angels-ladder -D
2 of 2 drafts rendered
0 future content
2 pages created
1 paginator pages created
0 tags created
0 categories created
in 18 ms

ged@DESKTOP-K1VCLO9 MINGW64 ~/work/blog
$ cd public/

ged@DESKTOP-K1VCLO9 MINGW64 ~/work/blog/public (gh-pages)
$ ls
404.html  css/  images/  index.html  index.xml  js/  page/  post/  sitemap.xml

ged@DESKTOP-K1VCLO9 MINGW64 ~/work/blog/public (gh-pages)
$ git status
On branch gh-pages
Your branch is up-to-date with 'origin/gh-pages'.
nothing to commit, working directory clean

ged@DESKTOP-K1VCLO9 MINGW64 ~/work/blog/public (gh-pages)
$

item.title: gege
item.description:
いろんなことが起きる。 これはびっくり。

特ダネですぜ。
